name: Connected by MAGNIFICENCE
description:
Unfortunately our Web Build Crashes and we are unable to upload our EXE build. If you wish to still play our game feel free to visit https://eazyyyy.itch.io/connected-by-magnificence-2

  • WASD - to move
  • MOUSE - to look
  • SPACE - to jump
  • LEFT SHIFT - to switch polarities (repel or attract)
  • R - to restart the level

Play as Magnet-boy and help get your magnet-friends to the end of each level by changing your polarity to attract or repel! Watch out for the green magnet-baddies, touching them will be your doom. 

This Game was created for the Game Makers Tool Kit Game Jam 2021 in 24 hours by Ron Liew and Ryan Matthews, with help from Erica Mitton!
